languages.text: "В свете того, что их агент теперь сопровождает вас, как член свиты, у многих могут возникнуть подозрения — не отреклась ли династия фон Валанциус от служения Империуму?"

traits.locale_text: "Более того, одна из ксеносов сопровождает вас, как полноправный член вашей свиты. Что побудило вас пойти на столь сомнительный союз?"

languages.text: "Given that their agent now accompanies you as a member of your retinue, many might wonder — has House von Valancius renounced its service to the Imperium?"
languages.original_text: "В свете того, что их агент теперь сопровождает вас, как член свиты, у многих могут возникнуть подозрения — не отреклась ли династия фон Валанциус от служения Империуму?"

traits.locale_text: "Given that their agent now accompanies you as a member of your retinue, many might wonder — did House von Valancius renounce its service to the Imperium?"
"Given that their agent now accompanies you as a member of your retinue, many might wonder — did House von Valancius renounce its service to the Imperium?"
"Given that their agent now accompanies you as a member of your retinue, many might wonder — has House von Valancius renounced its service to the Imperium?"
"Given that their agent now accompanies you as a member of your retinue, many might wonder — has House von Valancius renounced its service to the Imperium?"
"Given that their agent now accompanies you as a member of your retinue, many might wonder — has House von Valancius renounced its service to the Imperium?"

languages.text: 「異種族の工作員が今はお前の随行員として同行していることを思うと、疑問ばかりわいてくる。フォン・ヴァランシウス家は帝国への奉仕を拒否するのか？」
languages.original_text: "Given that their agent now accompanies you as a member of your retinue, many might wonder — has House von Valancius renounced its service to the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: 「異種族の工作員が今はお前の随行員として同行していることを思うと、疑問ばかりわいてくる。フォン・ヴァランシウス家は帝国への奉仕を拒否するのか？」

languages.original_text: "Given that their agent now accompanies you as a member of your retinue, many might wonder — has House von Valancius renounced its service to the Imperium?"

languages.text: “考虑到他们的成员如今已经成了你的随行人员，许多人或许会问——这是否意味着冯·瓦兰修斯家族已经背弃了对帝国的忠诚？”
languages.original_text: "Given that their agent now accompanies you as a member of your retinue, many might wonder — has House von Valancius renounced its service to the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: “考虑到他们的成员如今已经成了你的随行人员，许多人或许会问——这是否意味着冯·瓦兰修斯家族已经背弃了对帝国的忠诚？”

languages.text: «Dado que una de sus agentes ahora es miembro de su séquito, muchos se preguntan si la casa von Valancius ha renunciado a servir al Imperium».
languages.original_text: "Given that their agent now accompanies you as a member of your retinue, many might wonder — has House von Valancius renounced its service to the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: «Dado que una de sus agentes ahora es miembro de su séquito, muchos se preguntan si la casa von Valancius ha renunciado a servir al Imperium».

languages.text: « Étant donné que leur agente fait désormais partie de votre entourage, on est en droit de se demander si la maison von Valancius n'a pas renoncé à servir l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: "Given that their agent now accompanies you as a member of your retinue, many might wonder — has House von Valancius renounced its service to the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: « Étant donné que leur agente fait désormais partie de votre entourage, on est en droit de se demander si la maison von Valancius n'a pas renoncé à servir l'Imperium. »

languages.text: "Angesichts des Umstands, dass ihre Agentin Euch als Mitglied Eures Gefolges begleitet, könnte man sich fragen, ob das Haus von Valancius seinem Dienst gegenüber dem Imperium abgeschworen hat."
languages.original_text: "Given that their agent now accompanies you as a member of your retinue, many might wonder — has House von Valancius renounced its service to the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: "Angesichts des Umstands, dass ihre Agentin Euch als Mitglied Eures Gefolges begleitet, könnte man sich fragen, ob das Haus von Valancius seinem Dienst gegenüber dem Imperium abgeschworen hat."

languages.text: "Ajanlarından birinin artık maiyetinde yer aldığını da düşününce insan düşünmeden edemiyor; von Valancius Hanesi, İmparatorluk'a hizmet etmeyi bıraktı mı?"
languages.original_text: "Given that their agent now accompanies you as a member of your retinue, many might wonder — has House von Valancius renounced its service to the Imperium?"

traits.locale_text: "Ajanlarından birinin artık maiyetinde yer aldığını da düşününce insan düşünmeden edemiyor: von Valancius Hanesi, İmparatorluk'a hizmet etmekten vaz mı geçti?"
